page.title: 06GOLF CLUB.
page.content: GOLF CLUB. Whitburn Golf Club was established in 1932.It has 500 members. Membership is by invitation, applicants must be proposed and seconded by 2 existing members. The course covers 90 acres with a length of 6035 yards. The most difficult holes are generally considered to be the 11th and 18th. The present membership is 500,of which 380 are men and 110 women, and some juniors. Adult subscription is Â£140, Â£103 for ladies and Â£34 for juniors under 18. The youngest member is 7 years old. A round of golf costs Â£4. The grass is cut three times a week and the greenkeeper lives in Toll Cottage.The club professional is David Stephenson . Golf is growing in popularity due to its exposure on television.
